content: First, regarding the fourth quarter, Nasdaq achieved $906 million in net revenues, a 2% increase compared to the prior year period and a 5% increase on an organic basis, excluding the impact of changes in FX rates and acquisitions and divestitures. Our Trading Services business, which includes our transactional and U.S. paid plan data businesses, delivered combined total revenue of $253 million for the fourth quarter, an increase of 4% organically from the prior year period.
